book.synopsis: In a series of interviews, the acknowledged master of horror fiction reveals the creative source behind his stories, discussing his life, his career, and his philosophy on writing, and what he believes makes horror stories so popular
book.title_long: Bare Bones: Conversations on Terror With Stephen King
book.dimensions: Height: 8.25 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 1 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
